projects.title: Treasure Hunter
projects.description: Treasure Hunter is a 2D platformer in which you have to find a way to reach your goal. When I was creating this game I learned a lot about Unity and finally, I managed to publish the project on Google Play and itch.io.

projects.title: The Witcher 3: The Price Of Neutrality Remastered
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.
